launcher.startScript: (cd ~/jenkins-utils && git pull git@github.com:sifive/jenkins-utils.git) && \ AGENT_NAME=SLURM.CRITICAL.014 \ JNLP_SECRET=eb5803a62353646c33760319b4b04940d259012b4eafc227c30eb13ddd101887 \ JENKINS_AGENT_SLURM_PARTITION=redhat \ JENKINS_AGENT_SALLOC_ACCOUNT=misc_ci \ JENKINS_URL=https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/ \ ~/jenkins-utils/tools/jenkins-agent-salloc-small.sh
